targets.query: SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") *-1+100 FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^[C-Z]:$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(linear)
SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") *-1+100 FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^[C-Z]:$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(linear)
SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") *-1+100 FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^[C-Z]:$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(linear)
SELECT last("Threads") FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(/^.*usage.*$/) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(/^.*usage.*$/) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read_time" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read_time" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) *8 AS "Bytes recv", non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) *8 AS "Bytes sent" FROM "net"  WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) *8 AS "Bytes recv", non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) *8 AS "Bytes sent" FROM "net"  WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)
SELECT last(*) FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("await") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "device" = 'sda' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("await") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "device" = 'sda' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(total) AS "Total swap" FROM "swap" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host" WHERE (siem= 'on' )
list.label: HostName
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host" WHERE (siem= 'on' )
